attributes.action: Make it compulsory for every constituency in the United Kingdom to have at least 1 member of the U.K. Youth Parliament.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In Barrow and Furness, we have no youth Parliament, and, so have no vote, nor any way to get young peoples voices heard and their views across to the Government.

I urge the Government that it is not fair that any other constituency gets to have a MYP, but, Barrow and Furness dosen't!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
